Welcome

I’m a designer based in Vancouver, Canada. I currently work as a UX Designer at Jostle. Please enjoy this small sample of design I worked on between 2012 and 2014.

Map of the Internet

UI/UX, iOS, Android

Map of the Internet is exactly as it sounds. It’s a map of the internet!

Devmonitor.io

UX/UI, Branding, Front-end Dev

A web app for ‘devangelists’ to track questions from Stackoverflow.

View project

Know Ideas

Book Design, Print Production

A 130 page post-digital style reflection, Know Ideas describes the Internet using a series of small related experiments.
